root: ^I just can't imagine anyone who would do something like this.
^It is. And everyone here is like a friend. I feel like I would be betraying them to think of them as murderers.

s: ^Is there anyone you get along with well?
^Is there anyone you don't get along with?

Choice1: ^Well, sure. All of the acrobats. Even Jules. I still think of them as one of the acrobats.
Choice2: ^Oh dear, i couldn't possibly- Well, I suppose some of the customers can be mean sometimes.
^name sentimentBut all the employees have been so lovely.
^What about Jules? How have you gotten along with them?
Done: ^I've been worried about them ever since the accident yesterday.
^They used to be so happy, but they haven't been so happy since then.
^I even offered them flowers once, but I don't think it helped.
